## AbstractBatchPublishRequest type

Represents the abstract request for the publish/un-publish batch operations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type AbstractBatchPublishRequest = BatchOperationRequest & {
    Priority?: PublishPriority;
    TargetIdsOrPurposes?: Array<string>;
};
```
